content: if you guys have advance tasks and still have a task open, you can attach all of them to that task so they get captured. it won't count towards that task or your ranking, but will help it get used. just leave a note explaining what you're doing and separate it from the actual task work, so mentors aren't confused.
if you have trouble uploading or don't have any pending, you can also e-mail your work to devs@brlcad.org or (if it's too big), post it up somewhere and send an e-mail
